data.title: Who is Jodi Lister? Wife of late Dynasty actor Michael Nader
data.meta_description: DYNASTY star Michael Nader passed away at the age of 76 on August 23, 2021.His death was announced in a statement made public by his wife Jodi Lister.
data.text:
DYNASTY star Michael Nader passed away at the age of 76 on August 23, 2021.

His death was announced in a statement made public by his wife Jodi Lister. Here's what you need to know about her.

Who is Michael Nader's wife Jodi?

Actor Michael Nader is said to have died following a battle with an untreatable form of cancer.

Jodi stayed at his side until his last breath.

She wrote in her statement: "With a heavy heart I'm sharing the news of the passing of my beloved Michael."

"We had 18 wonderful years together with the many dogs we fostered and adopted.

"Michael was so thrilled to reconnect with his friends from the cast of ‘Dynasty’ during Emma Samms’ virtual event to help raise funds for long Covid research.

"Michael was working on a book about his life and addiction at the time of his death.

"He was a beautiful and fascinating man with many talents and skills. I will miss him forever."

Unlike her husband, known for portraying Dex in the ABC evening drama Dynasty and Dimitri Marick in All My Children, Jodi has had a tendency to remain away from the spotlight, rarely appearing at the actor's side.

Her origins, age and profession are not known and she is popularly known for being Michael's long-time partner.

How long were Michael Nader and Jodi married?

The couple got hitched on September 16, 2014, and would have celebrated their seventh wedding anniversary in 2021.

Jodi and Michael originally met in 2003, although the circumstances of their first meeting are not known.

They became inseparable for the next 18 years and spent most of their time fostering dogs.

Prior to his marriage with Jodi, Michael was married to Robin Weiss.

He also notably dated actress Ellen Barber for ten years.

Did Michael Nader and Jodi have children?

In the course of their 18-year relationship, Jodi and Michael had no children together.

However, the American star shared an only daughter with his first wife Robin, named Lindsay Michelle Nader.

Born on July 21, 1984, Lindsay followed in her father's footsteps and became an actress after recording her own music under the stage name Lu Nader.

Lindsay got her big break in 2009, when she played in Claire in the Oren Moverman film The Messenger.

She has also been seen in Whatever Works and The Sisterhood Of The Travelling Pants 2.

Michael was also a grandfather after Lindsay gave birth to a daughter named Juniper on December 16, 2016.

She has been in a long-term relationship with Trevor Easter since November 20, 2012, .
